summary: A look at the life of legendary fashion designer Valentino.
cast: Valentino Garavani|Giancarlo Giammetti|Nati Abascal|Giorgio Armani|Jeannie Becker|Marisa Berenson|Matthew Broderick|Michael Caine|Joan Collins|Jacqueline de Ribes|Vicomtesse Jacqueline de Ribes|Alessandra Facchinetti|Dante Ferretti|Tom Ford|Anne Hathaway|Elizabeth Hurley|Jacqueline Kennedy|Doutzen Kroes|Karl Lagerfeld|Elle Macpherson|Adrian Mainella|Matteo Marzotto|Rosario Nadal|Gwyneth Paltrow|Sarah Jessica Parker|Claudia Schiffer|Meryl Streep|André Leon Talley|Uma Thurman|Donatella Versace|Diane von Fürstenberg|Alek Wek|Anna Wintour
title: Valentino, el último emperador
